messages.subject: Pass test

messages.messageBody:
Good Morning Everyone,
Has anyone heard of or used the Pass Test? I live in NH and we are supposed
to give some form of evaluation. I was going to do a portfolio, because I was
doing "School at Home" at first then I switched to Unschooling (Lucky Me) So
anyway now Im afraid I wont have enough material for the portfolio, and Im
afraid that any evaluators around here would not understand Unschooling. Any
ideas? I would much appreciate it.

Tamie
